blogs.title: I just love catsss
blogs.body: Very excited about cats. Mine are feline perfection!
blogs.author: Cat Lady

blogs.title: Five ways to quickly ruin any living space
blogs.body: Scratch, chew, impart bodily fluids, shed luscious locks and - if possible - crush objects by sitting on them for lengthy periods of time
blogs.author: Rupert

blogs.title: Top tips for hiding
blogs.body: Find good hiding spot, hide in said hiding spot, do not come out until absolutely sure it is safe to do so!
blogs.author: Harry

blogs.title: My stink train terror
blogs.body: It was nearly midnight. A foul stench filled the air. I knew something was lurking in the other room; that it would take all my courage to face it...
blogs.author: Catman

blogs.title: How memory foam changed my life
blogs.body: I investigate all new objects that enter my house, absolutely NOTHING escapes my keen nose. Naturally I found my slave's new memory foam pillow immediately. As a conisseur of sleeping surfaces, I am rarely surprised. This revolutionary product surprised me and has made it to the top of my preferred-places-to-snooze list.
blogs.author: Harry
